dialogue.start: Hello, fellow traveler. would you mind to help me for a quick moment? You see, I have lost a precious trinket over at the oasis. Some Gnoll by the name of Ackbar stole. Please return my ring before my wife finds out!
dialogue.active: Hello again, have you got it yet?
dialogue.completed: Ah thank you traveler, you have saved me from despair and a divorce!
